bio.name: Emil Martinov
bio.welcomeMessage: Cliche as it is bridge building is what I do, between science of physics, consumer behavior and online behavior. I surf the web and create pieces of it.

jobs.title: Mentor for Frontend Web Development
jobs.description: Udacity is an online education platform which partners with companies like Google, Facebook, Github, Amazon and IBM to bring industry standard education programs to prepare candidates to the job market. I work as a reviewer and mentor to enable students grow into their job roles. I have reviewed hundreds of projects, with an average of 4.92 out of 5 as student feedback.

jobs.title: Online Content Intern
jobs.description: Tomtom taxi was a mobile app startup, which allowed consumers to book a taxi with a click of a button. The product was launched for IOS and Android. I was mainly part of the online team where we launched and managed the website in Dutch and English.

jobs.title: Co-founder
jobs.description: Fatale Entertainment is an organizer of international events for university students. It has partnership with one of the largest international student organization, ESN, and have organized events for up to 500 people. As a cofounder, I was responsible from Fatale brand by managing a coherent identity in online and offline mediums. I was also responsible for sponsors and venues.

jobs.title: Online Marketing Intern
jobs.description: Cross Capto is an online marketing company which provides clients with web design, SEO, SEM and marketing solutions.

projects.title: Neighbourhood Project
projects.description: In this project I used Yelp API, Google Maps API, Google StreetView API and Wikipedia API in order to create a map of Sydney where users can look at the first 20 Sushi Restaurants around the city.

projects.title: Udacity Interactive Resume
projects.description: Here i created an online resume using React to take care of the view and load the data from JSON. For CSS layout flexbox is used. For the build webpack is used. The data is on /src/one.json

projects.title: Classic Arcade Clone
projects.description: This is a simple frogger game. The player can start by playing the game immediately by using either arrow keys on the keyboard or WASD keys. Avoid the enemy bugs and try to reach the water. Once you reach the water you win the game.

projects.title: Website Optimization
projects.description: The project was about using best practices for performance on websites. This included fonts optimisation through @font face, inlining css, minimising images and server request prioritisation. Also in the pizza web page, animations were improved through optimising the code (loop contents), using translate 3d hack and request animations in order to reach 60 fps quality measure.

projects.title: Feedreader Testing
projects.description: In this project, I created tests for a Feed Reader application. I checked whether the feed loaded appropriate content, if the menu toggled or not and if the feed changed when a new feed was loaded asynchronously.
